featured.text: A far less lucky 1 in 150 experiences high fever, tremors, paralysis, and coma.
About 1 in 5 persons suffers fever, headaches, and body aches, usually lasting a week or so.
Over 100,000 people with “gold fever” made this trip hoping to become millionaires.

definition.zh_def: 發燒，體溫異常升高的狀態，通常是由於感染或疾病引起的。
definition.en_def: A temporary increase in body temperature, often due to an illness or infection.
definition.example: She stayed home from school because she had a fever.
